entries.succeed_audition: [ \#pcontrast1 SUCCESS \#.] You have successfully passed the audition! You should return to and speak with the theater manager.
entries.fail_audition: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] You did not correctly follow the judge's instructions in a timely manner.
entries.fail_not_in_audition_area: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] You were not on the main stage area when the audition began.
entries.fail_left_audition_area: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] You have left the main stage area during the audition.
entries.audition_step_6: Yes, good. And now flourish %DI, please.
entries.audition_step_5: Good, good. And perform flourish %DI, please.
entries.audition_step_4: Excellent. Now change the style and perform %TO, please.
entries.audition_step_2: Very good. Now perform flourish %DI for us, please.
entries.audition_step_1: Hello and welcome. Begin by performing %TO for us, please.
entries.audition_begin: The audition has begun! Listen to and follow the instructions given to you by the judges.
entries.audition_time_remaining: You have thirty seconds to be on stage, ready to begin the audition.
entries.popularity_starting_message: You must entertain %DI players to acquire the next popularity rank.
entries.payout: You have received %DI credits from the theater manager.
entries.succeed_performance: [ \#pcontrast1 SUCCESS \#.] You have successfully entertained the audience!
entries.fail_not_satisfied: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] The audience was not satisfied by your performance.
entries.fail_not_playing: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] Too much time has elapsed without performing.
entries.fail_not_in_area: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] You were not on the main stage area when the performance began.
entries.fail_left_performance_area: [ \#pcontrast2 FAILURE \#.] You have left the main stage area during the performance.
entries.performance_begin: The show has started and will last %DI seconds! You should start performing now if you haven't already!
entries.time_remaining: You have %DI seconds before you must be on stage.
entries.popularity_3_remaining: You are entertaining %TO. You must entertain %DI more people to achieve Popularity Rank Three.
entries.popularity_2_remaining: You are entertaining %TO. You must entertain %DI more people to achieve Popularity Rank Two.
entries.popularity_1_remaining: You are entertaining %TO. You must entertain %DI more people to achieve Popularity Rank One.
entries.popularity_3_complete: Congratulations! You have achieved Popularity Rank Three!
entries.popularity_2_complete: Congratulations! You have achieved Popularity Rank Two!
entries.popularity_1_complete: Congratulations! You have achieved Popularity Rank One!
